Welcome to Physics Calculator’s documentation!

This is the official documentation for the Physics Calculator website. It includes a full website tutorial as well as user reference for the website’s capabilities.

Physics Calculator is a website capable of solving basic kinematics problems. At this stage in development, it does not account for forces or mass, just the motion of the object. The website is designed to be as simple as possible to use, but there are a lot of things you can do. Please use this site to familiarize yourself with all the features and how to use them.

Warning

Physics Calculator is in alpha. The website may sporadically go offline, lose functionality, or undergo major changes. Additionally, this documentation will likely be unfinished until the beta release.

Get Started

Let’s learn how to use the website step by step! For more depth on specific features, refer to the User Reference section. Note that this tutorial is intended for computer use only. Several features of the website are different or missing on the phone.

Ready to start?

Continue to the Tutorial!
